title: Accounting

description: Individual event covering corporate and managerial accounting (formerly Accounting II).

description: Individual event covering the principles and practices of advertising.

title: Agribusiness

description: Team event testing knowledge of banking and finance through a performance and test.

title: Business Ethics
description: Team event involving the presentation of an ethical solution to a business problem.

title: Coding & Programming
description: Individual or team event testing software development and programming skills.

title: Data Science & AI
description: New 2025-26 event focused on data analytics, machine learning, and AI applications.

title: Mobile Application Development
description: Individual or team event to design and develop a mobile app for the annual theme.

title: Social Media Strategies
description: Team event focused on creating and presenting a social media campaign.

title: Website Design
description: Individual or team event to design and build a functional website.

title: Business Communication
description: Individual event testing written and oral communication skills in business.

title: Business Law
description: Individual event focused on legal principles affecting business.

title: Cybersecurity
description: Individual event testing knowledge of security threats and data protection.

title: Economics
description: Individual event covering micro and macro economics.

title: Entrepreneurship
description: Team event simulating the creation and management of a new business venture.

title: Hospitality & Event Management
description: Team event testing knowledge of the hospitality industry and event planning.

title: International Business
description: Team event focused on global business concepts and cultural awareness.

title: Journalism
description: Individual event testing knowledge of media history, ethics, and writing.

title: Networking Infrastructures
description: Individual event focused on computer networks and technical troubleshooting.

title: Public Speaking
description: Individual event involving a prepared speech on business-related topics.

title: Graphic Design
description: Individual or team event focused on visual communication and layout.

title: Management Information Systems
description: Team event testing technical and management skills in information systems.

title: Marketing
description: Team event simulating marketing strategy and presentation.

title: Supply Chain Management

title: Client Service
description: Individual event simulating customer service scenarios.

title: Electronic Career Portfolio
